headline: Global markets hold steady as earnings season kicks off
summary: Investors remain cautious but optimistic while major companies prepare to report quarterly performance.

headline: Severe weather system moves up the Atlantic coast
summary: Heavy rain and snow are forecast across several states. Emergency services urge residents to follow local alerts.

headline: Breakthrough in renewable storage technology announced
summary: Researchers unveiled a new battery chemistry that could double grid-level storage capacity within five years.
